caption: Henri Matisse (1869–1954; born Le Cateau-Cambrésis, France; died Nice, France), La robe jaune au ruban noir (The yellow dress with a black ribbon), 1922. Crayon lithograph printed in black on "chine" (thin newsprint-quality) paper (Duthuit-Matisse/Duthuit 424); 39.2 x 28.8 cm (image), 53.5 x 35.8 cm (sheet). Bequest of Henriette S.H. Gettner in honor of Victor S. Gettner, Class of 1927 (1998-173)
